level.text: A review panel selected by the Agency shall review each application to determine if it meets the requirements that apply to the particular grant.
The review panel shall advise the Director of all those applications which satisfy the applicable grant requirements and shall recommend awards based on the review factors and available funding.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking at 53 DCR 7448 (September 8, 2006) [EXPIRED]; and as amended by Final Rulemaking at 54 DCR 120 (January 5, 2007).
